trans-unit.source: Initiates an asynchronous operation to break the current lease on this blob.
trans-unit.target: Initiates an asynchronous operation to break the current lease on this blob.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> representing the amount of time to allow the lease to remain, which will be rounded down to seconds.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> representing the amount of time to allow the lease to remain, which will be rounded down to seconds.

trans-unit.source: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, the break period is the remainder of the current lease, or zero for infinite leases.
trans-unit.target: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, the break period is the remainder of the current lease, or zero for infinite leases.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1</codeEntityReference> object of type <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1</codeEntityReference> object of type <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> that represents the asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed.

trans-unit.source: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, no condition is used.
trans-unit.target: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, no condition is used.
